Description.p: A subset of SNOMED-CT intended for use in the UK, a set of codes which represent different types of care plan that may be produced for an individual.

Any code from the SNOMED CT UK CarePlan subset with subset original id 6061000000139.
The use of this subset is Advisory as defined in latest version of "NPFIT-ELIBR-AREL-P1R2-0178 Technical Guidance for Implementation of Templated CDA Domains."
